name: Gem Miner (itch) (kaiakairos)
description:
A simple casual game about mining for goodies. Inspired by the underground mining minigame from gen 4 pokemon games.

Only requires the mouse to control :)

Possible planned future additions:

  • Purchasable upgrades
  • List of goodies discovered
  • More goodies
  • Money leaderboard
  • Other modes?

If you have any feature suggestions I'm all ears in the comments :3
